paragraphs.text:
%md

# MySQL - JDBC Konfiguration

* Wichtig:  einen *neuen* JDBC Interpreter erstellen

![Create](https://zeppelin.apache.org/docs/0.8.0/assets/themes/zeppelin/img/docs-img/click_create_button.png)
![Name](https://zeppelin.apache.org/docs/0.8.0/assets/themes/zeppelin/img/docs-img/select_name_and_group.png)

msg.data:
MySQL - JDBC Konfiguration

  • Wichtig: einen neuen JDBC Interpreter erstellen

paragraphs.text:
%md

* Wechsel auf MySQL (statt default PostgreSQL)
```text
default.driver             com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
default.url                jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/
default.user               reader
default.password           reader
```

* JDBC Treiber
Dependencies, artifact 
```text
/usr/share/java/mysql.jar
```

* Es düfen keine Punkte `.` in den Bezeichnern verwendet werden

* weitere Verbindungen
```text
sb-db-01_reader.driver     com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
sb-db-01_reader.url        jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/
sb-db-01_reader.user       reader
sb-db-01_reader.password   reader
sb-db-01_zepadmin.driver   com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
sb-db-01_zepadmin.url      jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/
sb-db-01_zepadmin.user     zepadmin
sb-db-01_zepadmin.password dbAdmin
```

default.user               reader

  • JDBC Treiber

  • Es düfen keine Punkte . in den Bezeichnern verwendet werden

msg.data:
Config-File

Die Angaben werden automatisch in conf/interpreter.json geschrieben

        "sb-db-01_zepadmin.driver": {
          "name": "sb-db-01_zepadmin.driver",
          "value": "com.mysql.jdbc.Driver",
          "type": "textarea"
        },
        "sb-db-01_zepadmin.url": {
          "name": "sb-db-01_zepadmin.url",
          "value": "jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/",
          "type": "textarea"
        },
        "sb-db-01_zepadmin.user": {
          "name": "sb-db-01_zepadmin.user",
          "value": "zepadmin",
          "type": "textarea"
        },
        "sb-db-01_zepadmin.password": {
          "name": "sb-db-01_zepadmin.password",
          "value": "dbAdmin",
          "type": "password"
        },

        "sb-db-01_reader.driver": {
          "name": "sb-db-01_reader.driver",
          "value": "com.mysql.jdbc.Driver",
          "type": "textarea"
        },
        "sb-db-01_reader.url": {
          "name": "sb-db-01_reader.url",
          "value": "jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/",
          "type": "textarea"
        },
        "sb-db-01_reader.user": {
          "name": "sb-db-01_reader.user",
          "value": "reader",
          "type": "textarea"
        },
        "sb-db-01_reader.password": {
          "name": "sb-db-01_reader.password",
          "value": "reader",
          "type": "password"
        },
